code: import api from'./api';export const tasksService={getByGoalId:async goalId=>{const response=await api.get("/tasks/goals/".concat(goalId));return response.data;},getById:async id=>{const response=await api.get("/tasks/".concat(id));return response.data;},create:async(goalId,data)=>{const response=await api.post("/tasks/goals/".concat(goalId),data);return response.data;},update:async(id,data)=>{await api.put("/tasks/".concat(id),data);},delete:async id=>{await api.delete("/tasks/".concat(id));},reorder:async(goalId,taskIds)=>{await api.put("/tasks/goals/".concat(goalId,"/reorder"),{taskIds});}};
